- [code-architecture-diagram-llm-app](https://github.com/parmsam/code-architecture-diagram-llm-app/):
  Uses OpenAI API to generate a code architecture diagrams for Github
  Repos
- [quarto-clipper-llm-app](https://github.com/parmsam/quarto-clipper-llm-app):
  Uses OpenAI API and Beautiful Soup to convert a webpage to a Quarto
  document
- [auto-wiki-links-llm-app](https://github.com/parmsam/auto-wiki-links-llm-app):
  Uses OpenAI API to generate a auto-link a body of text with Wikipedia
  links
